_header: I will that ye flee sin
_description: Exhortation to be Meek and True — one quatrain

BLHar2316.Transcription: I wile þat ye fle sinneand ȝat ye be mekeOf falshed loke ye blinnebetȝtrewe in dede and speke
BLHar2316.Note: Incorrectly listed as on folio 13 in IMEV and NIMEV; written as prose.
BLHar2316.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas. 
             A selection of Latin stories.
Percy Society
         8. London: Richard, 1842: 105.
